greeting: Hello, My name is Inna. I'm looking for a position as a front-end developer.
introduce: I am currently seeking a position as a front-end developer. I have recently completed several comprehensive online courses in front-end development and undertaken substantial practical work to further enhance my skills and professional growth in this field.
collaborate: So, I would be glad to collaborate with your team.
cta-collaboration: If you are interested in collaborating with me, please feel free to contact me or review my resume.
bio: I was born on January 21, 1993, in Mykolaiv, Ukraine.
education: I graduated from Petro Mohyla Black Sea University in 2015 with a degree as a specialist in Computer Engineering
jobs: From 2016 to 2023, I worked as a Software Engineer at Time IT.
contactText: If you have any questions or would like to work together, please send me a message.
